title: NBRC Notification 2026 - Apply Offline for Research Assistant III Posts
description: The National Brain Research Centre (NBRC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Research Assistant III Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.Sc., can apply for the NBRC Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, appli...
